lu_part1: D'Wieder erkennt een um Wand, den HÃ¤r um Kniecht,
en_literal_translation_p1: You recognize the weather by the wall, the master by the servant,
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p1: You can judge a man by the company he keeps,
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p2: and a father by his child.
